message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a highly valuable product that I believe would significantly benefit you. Given its worth to you, I understand it's priced at $15,000. My proposal is to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $12,500. This represents a substantial saving for you and a fair deal for me. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding.
